unnormalised: ## Samosas and Scandals: Your Weekly Dose of Bollywood Buzz!
normalised: ## Samosas and Scandals: Your Weekly Dose of Bollywood Buzz!

unnormalised: Namaste folks! Grab your chai, because the gossip train is leaving the station and itâ€™s got some seriously spicy cargo this week.
normalised: Namaste folks! Grab your chai, because the gossip train is leaving the station and it's got some seriously spicy cargo this week.

unnormalised: First up, rumours are swirling faster than a dhol beat at a wedding about Alia Bhatt and Ranbir Kapoor (still!). Sources are saying they're "definitely working on something BIG," hinting at a possible Dharma Productions venture sometime in October. Maybe a sequel to "Brahmastra"? Only time will tell, but my chai is already getting cold waiting for the deets.

Sources are saying they're "definitely working on something big," hinting at a possible Dharma Productions venture sometime in October. Maybe a sequel to "Brahmastra"? Only time will tell, but my chai is already getting cold waiting for the deets.

unnormalised: Then there's the whole saga involving Kartik Aaryan. Apparently, he was spotted leaving designer Manish Malhotra's studio at 3 AM, looking suspiciously happy. New project, new love interest, or just a really late fitting? The mystery is thicker than dal makhani, y'all!

unnormalised: Speaking of love, gossip mills are churning about Janhvi Kapoor and her alleged new beau, who's apparently a "Delhi-based businessman," someone "connected to IIT Delhi". Sources have even claimed they were holding hands at a recent family function in Bandra. Could wedding bells be ringing?

unnormalised: And hold your horses, because this just in! There are whispers about Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone taking a "private holiday" to the Maldives. Pictures have surfaced online, although they are blurry! Were they having romantic walks along the beach? We will find out!

unnormalised: On a slightly less scandalous note, Priyanka Chopra was seen donating a huge amount - apparently Rs. 50 lakhs - to a local NGO in Lucknow. Respect!

unnormalised: Also, is it true that Karan Johar is planning a Koffee with Karan episode with Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma, with maybe even baby Vamika making a cameo? The ratings would explode faster than a firecracker on Diwali!
